data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

Place your index finger on the tip of the middle finger, and it points. Move your index finger to the middle finger. Take 10 steps forward. Make the same move once again. Take 9 steps right. Make the same change to turn right again.
